content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #89647 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?

So, I've been idling monitoring issues like this one (all prioritized to P-medium, iirc) since the new LLVM PassManager was stabilized and enabled by default.

I think there is a problem with the new pass manager and the wasm32 target but this needs some investigation, so now I'm thinking to nominate this issue for the next T-compiler meeting and maybe group together a bit these issues.

This is a target tier 2 so technically a P-medium would be ok, but ... there are also crates like ruffle that are starting to pinpoint old Rust versions and I am afraid of a ripple effect in other wasm32 works
Issue #89647 has been closed while requested for prioritization.
